content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. Can I get your name to get started?
Thanks, Mike! Whatâ€™s the address where you need service?
Yeah, it's uh, well, it's the place next to the post office, you know? By Main. I think you guys have it from last year.
Could you give me the full street address for scheduling? Just want to be sure we're sending our plumber to the right place!
It's, you know, right off Main.  Next to the post, just ask for Mike. Sorry, I don't remember the number off the top of my head.
I'm having trouble confirming your address for our scheduling system. Let me get a human operator to help out!
reason: Agent cannot gather a usable address.

content: Hi Mike, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. Could you please check a piece of mail or document for your full address and send it to me? We want to make sure our plumber gets to you without any issues. Thanks!
Oh okay, found it. 217 Main Street. Sorry for the hassle!
No problem at all, Mike. Thanks for sending that. What time works best for you for a visit from our plumber?
Anytime in the afternoon if possible.
Got it! We can have someone there between 2pm and 4pm tomorrow (Tuesday). Does that work for you?
Yep, looks good. See you then. Thanks Edgar!
